about_the_game:
Life Codex is a captivating puzzle game that transports you into the pages of an enigmatic book. In this unique adventure, you'll manipulate time to solve intricate puzzles, uncover secrets, and unravel a profound story where anyone can find something meaningful if they are searching for it.

Explore a world crafted with dark, haunting visuals and an evocative soundtrack that immerses you in melancholic beauty. Each level challenges you to think creatively and strategically, navigating through the timeline of events to piece together the narrative.



Every page turned, every puzzle solved, brings you closer to understanding the deeper meaning behind the story.
